title: Fashion History Now #26: Little Red Fashion for Kids and Teens, an interview with Jonathan Joseph
itunes:title: Fashion History Now #26: Little Red Fashion for Kids and Teens, an interview with Jonathan Joseph
description:
Parents rejoice! This week fellow Dressed listener Jonathan Joseph joins us to speak about his new fashion ed-tech start up for kids and teens.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
